title: Flashcard
shortDescription: Show important updates and information on your site.
longDescription:
### Flashcard is a great way to display important notifications

Flashcard makes it super easy to add any information on your site in the form of a floating card. You can show a title, a message and a button which takes the user to any link when clicked.

+ Its one of the few apps on Cloudflare with 100% rating
+ Being used on 1000+ websites

# Common use-cases 

- Sales annoucements
- Blog posts
- Product launches
- Price changes
- Cookie consent
author: Moin Uddin

categories.title: UI & Design
categories.description: Apps that make your website more beautiful and user friendly.

categories.description: Promote content, collect email addresses, and increase engagement.

proposedApp.title: Flashcard
proposedApp.shortDescription: Show important updates and information on your site
proposedApp.longDescription:
Flashcard makes it supper easy to add any information on your site in form of a card.

It can have a title, a message and a button which can take user to any link you want.

its a great way to display an important notification without any effort.

Some examples of what you can use it for:

- Cookie consent
- Announcement of Sale
- Change in prices
- New product launch
- New eBook release
- A new blog post

Its beautifuly designed and uses minimal resources. It won't take much of bandwidth and is also optimized for mobile devices.

You can use it to display different messages. It intelligently keeps track of closed messages and shows new ones without any conflict.
proposedApp.author: Moin Uddin

products.title: free
products.shortDescription: Use basic version without image support.
products.longDescription:
This free version does not support adding an image to the Flashcard.

'Powered by Flashcard' is also added at the bottom.

products.title: pro
products.longDescription:
### Add Image

Add image to your flashcard to increase conversion. Studies have shown that images can increase the number of clicks.

versions.releaseNotes:
This update adds some of the most requested features.

- Adds the ability to stop showing Flashcard when not needed
- Allows custom color option for action button
- Adds the option to set if the action URL should be opened in current tab or new one
- You can now also hide the action button if you just want to show text
